<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a25c8a0da73b2ea2aa9f4f8d1e182a4b8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a25c8a0da73b2ea2aa9f4f8d1e182a4b8">getPassName</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4a04b1645abb3ed8051fc9ddf81a1db0">LoongArch&#95;MERGE&#95;BASE&#95;OFFSET&#95;NAME</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a20f450b344b722e5534092d5dca3fb5d">LoongArchMergeBaseOffsetOpt::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="#a735102341f94b533b3c6b75f22989db4"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a7801f01244d971909002d066de0b005e">LoongArchMergeBaseOffsetOpt</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="#a4a04b1645abb3ed8051fc9ddf81a1db0">LoongArch&#95;MERGE&#95;BASE&#95;OFFSET&#95;NAME</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect either of the patterns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 (small/medium):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pcalau12i vreg1, %pc&#95;hi20(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi.d    vreg2, vreg1, %pc&#95;lo12(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (large):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pcalau12i vreg1, %pc&#95;hi20(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi.d    vreg2, $zero, %pc&#95;lo12(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lu32i.d   vreg3, vreg2, %pc64&#95;lo20(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lu52i.d   vreg4, vreg3, %pc64&#95;hi12(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add.d     vreg5, vreg4, vreg1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pattern is only accepted if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    1) For small and medium pattern, the first instruction has only one use,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       which is the ADDI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    2) For large pattern, the first four instructions each have only one use,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       and the user of the fourth instruction is ADD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    3) The address operands have the appropriate type, reflecting the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       lowering of a global address or constant pool using the pattern.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    4) The offset value in the Global Address or Constant Pool is 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">bool <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a7801f01244d971909002d066de0b005e">LoongArchMergeBaseOffsetOpt</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a2162f9aa7ada44df36c73fd84240b73d">detectFoldable</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Hi20,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Lo12,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Lo20,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Hi12,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Hi20.getOpcode() != LoongArch::PCALAU12I)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#ab4d10aeb6baa9b7d22a3e7a108243e7a">LoongArchII::getDirectFlags</a>(Hi20Op1) != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a5e18166bf3ee69c16c30ada264da3067">LoongArchII::MO&#95;PCREL&#95;HI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the offset in Hi20, Lo12, Lo20 and Hi12 instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete the tail instruction and update all the uses to use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// output from Last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#abdd08d782bfb8c6b53e27485a53a3477"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#abdd08d782bfb8c6b53e27485a53a3477">LoongArchMergeBaseOffsetOpt::foldOffset</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Hi20, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Lo12, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Lo20,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Hi12, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Put the offset back in Hi and the Lo</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Merged offset &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; into base.\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;     &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Hi20 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;     &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Lo12;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Lo20 &amp;&amp; Hi12) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;     &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Lo20 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;     &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Hi12;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect patterns for large offsets that are passed into an ADD instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pattern is found, updates the offset in Hi20, Lo12, Lo20 and Hi12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions and deletes TailAdd and the instructions that produced the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (The instructions marked with &quot;!&quot; are not necessarily present)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        Base address lowering is of the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           Hi20:  pcalau12i vreg1, %pc&#95;hi20(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +- Lo12:  addi.d vreg2, vreg1, %pc&#95;lo12(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |  Lo20:  lu32i.d vreg2, %pc64&#95;lo20(s) !</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +- Hi12:  lu52i.d vreg2, vreg2, %pc64&#95;hi12(s) !</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        | The large offset can be one of the forms:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +-&gt; 1) Offset that has non zero bits in Hi20 and Lo12 bits:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetHi20: lu12i.w vreg3, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetLo12: ori voff, vreg3, 188    ------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |                                                           |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +-&gt; 2) Offset that has non zero bits in Hi20 bits only:     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetHi20: lu12i.w voff, 128       ------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |                                                           |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +-&gt; 3) Offset that has non zero bits in Lo20 bits:          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetHi20: lu12i.w vreg3, 121 !                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetLo12: ori voff, vreg3, 122 !                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |     OffsetLo20: lu32i.d voff, 123       ------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +-&gt; 4) Offset that has non zero bits in Hi12 bits:          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              OffsetHi20: lu12i.w vreg3, 121 !                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              OffsetLo12: ori voff, vreg3, 122 !                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              OffsetLo20: lu32i.d vreg3, 123 !                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              OffsetHi12: lu52i.d voff, vrg3, 124 ------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        TailAdd: add.d  vreg4, vreg2, voff       &lt;------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a5278ce924df77790e6a938f5065ba5a0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loongarchmergebaseoffset-cpp-/loongarchmergebaseoffsetopt/#a5278ce924df77790e6a938f5065ba5a0">LoongArchMergeBaseOffsetOpt::foldLargeOffset</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Hi20, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Lo12, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Lo20,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;Hi12, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;TailAdd,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> GAReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == LoongArch::ADD&#95;W ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">          TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == LoongArch::ADD&#95;D) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected ADD instruction!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Rs = TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Rt = TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = Rs == GAReg ? Rt : Rs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Instrs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t Mask = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can point to one of &#91;ORI, LU12I.W, LU32I.D, LU52I.D&#93;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; 4; i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle Reg is R0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Reg == LoongArch::R0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t fold if the register has more than one use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Reg.isVirtual() || !MRI-&gt;hasOneUse(Reg))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CommonOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InlineAsmMemoryOpIndexes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::make&#95;pair(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a6cf2f8996b1e9aaf2d7a435aaa62382f">UseMI</a>, InlineAsmMemoryOpIndexes));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found a common offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the offsets in global address lowering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may have already folded some arithmetic so we need to add to any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// existing offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t NewOffset = Hi20.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af624ff47eaa512dbe23866accb3837c1">getOffset</a>() + &#42;CommonOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LA32 ignores the upper 32 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST-&gt;is64Bit())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64&lt;32&gt;</a>(NewOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only fold simm32 offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;32&gt;</a>(NewOffset))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If optimized by this pass successfully, MO&#95;RELAX bitmask target-flag should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be removed from the code sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pcalau12i $a0, %pc&#95;hi20(symbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi.d $a0, $a0, %pc&#95;lo12(symbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ld.w $a0, $a0, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   pcalau12i $a0, %pc&#95;hi20(symbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ld.w $a0, $a0, %pc&#95;lo12(symbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Code sequence optimized before can be relax by linker. But after being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimized, it cannot be relaxed any more. So MO&#95;RELAX flag should not be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// carried by them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Hi20.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#aa233a8fe996a2045f5b02f5161e145c2">setOffset</a>(NewOffset);</span></CodeLine>
